sentences.en: A single base might in principle suffice for computation.
sentences.cn: 在原理上用一条基线就能满足计算的要求.

sentences.en: Addition and division are forms of computation.
sentences.cn: 加法和除法都是计算方法.

sentences.en: Division is a form of computation.
Exact computation of the burning surface area is lengthy.
sentences.cn: 燃烧面积的精确计算是非常繁难的.

sentences.en: His extortions from the industrious poor have been beyond computation.
sentences.cn: 他对劳苦人民的横征暴敛无法计算.

sentences.en: It is not entirely suited to automatic computation.
sentences.cn: 它不完全适合自动化计算.

sentences.en: It will cost 5000 at the lowest computation.
Logarithms were invented to shorten the work of extended numerical computation.
sentences.cn: 人们发明对数来缩短运算冗长的数值计算工作.

sentences.en: The computation of approximate solutions was an extremely laborious task.
sentences.cn: 近似解的计算是极其繁重的工作.

sentences.en: the computation of the monthly statistics
The discrepancies resulted from different methods of computation.
sentences.cn: 这些差异是由不同的计算方法造成的。

sentences.en: The finite - difference computation must be convergent and stable.
sentences.cn: 有限差分计算必须收敛和稳定.

sentences.en: The manner of this computation is consigned to Appendix 1 . 3.
sentences.cn: 这种计算方法放在附录1.3中.

sentences.en: The preliminary computation is the same as that for ordinary levelling.
sentences.cn: 概算与普遍水准测量相同.

sentences.en: The wide application of electronic computers in science and technology will free man from the labour of complicated measurement and computation.
sentences.cn: 电子计算机在科学技术方面广泛的应用将使人们从复杂的计量和计算中摆脱出来.

sentences.en: Their output of data does not slow computation.
sentences.cn: 它的数据输出不会延缓计算.
